name: Flatfoot
description:
Currently unfinished. There's a small map to roam around in, three guards that can chase you around, and a secret way into the building. I was hoping to add voice lines for the guards so that you could hear what's going on behind you, but I didn't get around to adding any sound effects.

The graphics are rendered and dithered to just three colours, which makes it kind of hard to see what's going on. If you're really having trouble, press F1 to turn off the shader.

I'll follow up some time with a post jam version with sound effects and an actual level to explore. I'll bump the resolution to 128x128 too, it makes it a lot more playable.

Controls

WASD - move

Left click - interact

Right click - flashlight

Space - jump

Shift - sprint

Control - crouch

F1 - toggle the shader

Credits

Programming and art assets - Sean Gilhuly

Music - Alex McCulloch (Jazz Take 2)
